abstract: Oprah Winfrey’s new cable network signs its first major deal with an advertiser — Procter & Gamble.
snippet: Oprah Winfrey’s new cable network signs its first major deal with an advertiser — Procter & Gamble.
lead_paragraph: Oprah Winfrey’s forthcoming cable channel has completed its first major advertiser deal. The consumer goods company Procter & Gamble is on board for what it calls a “multi-year media deal” with OWN, which is short for The Oprah Winfrey Network.

headline.main: Winfrey’s Channel Gets First Major Advertiser
